title: "About"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


This site is an unofficial collection of posts related to the development of software to support the [Argo international research program](https://argo.ucsd.edu/). Several projects related to this blog include [argoFloats](https://github.com/ArgoCanada/argoFloats), [argodata](https://github.com/ArgoCanada/argodata), and [bgcArgoDMQC](https://github.com/ArgoCanada/bgcArgoDMQC).
